commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Starting today, I shall be joining you formally as a member of the School Idol Club. I sincerely look forward to working with you.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Too stuffy, Shioko! You're being waaay too formal! Every school idol should have a good smile, so show us what you've got!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That may be so, but a proper introductory greeting is customary. Stuffy or not, shouldn't I say something to mark the occasion?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That introduction suited you perfectly, Shio-ti! No worries!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* Let's aim for even greater school idol heights together!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now that I have decided to join you, I don't plan on doing anything half-heartedly.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You're so dependable.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We're really happy to have you, Shioriko. Let's do our best together!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Th-Thank you.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Getting a new member has gotten me fired up to do even better!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll have to work hard to keep up with you, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Same, but I'll never let you surpass me. You got that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you kind of nervous?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: This is my first time joining the club as an actual member, so yes...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is something wrong?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Ah, it appears as though I am a little nervous...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You've been here tons of times to practice with us. Just relax!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That may be so, but my position is different now, so...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shioko, are you actually kinda timid?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't worry. You'll get used to us in no time.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I do hope so.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heh heh... Well, since you're new here, let me teach you the rules of our School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, please do.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: First of all, new recruits must take care of the senior members. So, go and fetch us some juice and yakisoba sandwiches!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see. Understood. I will get them right away.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, hang on! We don't have a rule like that!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi, bad!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I was just joking.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Hm? So, should I go to get them? Should I not go to get them? How very confusing.
